comments:
description:
Library Explorer can't be initiated 

steps to reproduce:
1. choose window>show view>Library Explorer

actual result:
"Unable to create view: Plug-in 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.lib.explorer was unable to load class 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.lib.explorer.LibraryExplorerView." shows up

expected result:
Library explorer can't initiated.
